name: Nehr Canyon
description:
Introduction

A short canyon in Pacoima with a short narrows section and one mandatory rappel. It's right next to the Wildlife Waystation so you can hear lions, monkeys and exotic birds as you hike up. The technical section while quite short is nice.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

First Descent by Alden Anderson and Mika Enriquez on Feb 29, 2016.
